introduction.p: This control template is the base class of all control templates for ribbon gallery controls. Implement <RibbonGalleryListTemplate/> to create a control template for <BindableRibbonGalleryList/>.

prop.name: Commands
prop.p: The type of this property is (vl::)presentation::controls::IRibbonGalleryCommandExecutor*.
This property is set after this control template is applied to a control. It offers a way for this control template to communicate with the control.
There must be three navigation buttons, calling the NotifyScrollUp, NotifyScrollDown and NotifyDropdown methods of Commands.

prop.name: ScrollUpEnabled
prop.p: This property is set to true when scrolling up is doable.

prop.name: ScrollDownEnabled
prop.p: This property is set to true when scrolling down is doable.
